direct_enhancements.method_name: printHelp(PrintWriter, int, String, String, Options, int, int, String, boolean)
direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods print help information to a PrintWriter, but printUsage focuses on usage syntax while printHelp provides more detailed help.
Both methods handle the formatting and appending of option information to a StringBuilder, with similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods handle text wrapping and printing to a PrintWriter, with printUsage focusing on usage syntax and printWrapped on general text wrapping.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require a PrintWriter to be initialized for output.
Setting up the Options object is required before printing usage information.
Both methods handle output verification and may throw exceptions if the output is not as expected.
